price: 51. Kaadu ken buqrel uma caacay rubnek tokkel too buqre walqinnowteh tet yablen, wonnal tet yubleeniik gamadal Yallal koroositeeh, Kay niqmat yengedde marah raaqan.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رِيحٗا فَرَأَوۡهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا لَّظَلُّواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in arsalnā rīḥan fara-awhu muṣ'farran laẓallū min baʿdihi yakfurūna
